data.content:
I added webmentions to my site today! I found which made it all really easy.

I haven’t automated rebuilds or sending yet, that will still be manual for now…but nothing wrong with incrementalism!

Cross-posted to indieforums

data.content: I’ve been using Fastmail for a little over a year and have loved it. I actually stopped using the Apple Mail app (on both iOS and Mac) because their app / browser experience is so much better. Can’t recommend them enough!
